page.title: 07A DAY IN MY LIFE IN 1985
page.content: Jeanette ,Louise ,Jane, caroline M. Caroline Midgley and Anita. I was on Ann and Jeanettes team . When it was time for the other team to bat, the whistle went so we said they could have their turn next playtime. The classes all lined up to come into school and we came in as age groups with junior 4 first. We had a maths test with Mrs. Henry then she finished reading the story which we started on Monday. Then it was dinnertime we played rounders and then went into school for our dinner. After dinner we played rounders on the field until 1.15 then we came in and had a lesson with Mrs. Brindley, it was english. Afternoon playtime was at 2.30.W e had story with Mrs. Brindley after playtime and at 3.30 we went home. When I got home I played with my dog for a bit then I had my tea.
